talk.abstract: Plone is one of the oldest open source python communities still working today. Despite a decade of trials and tribulations, the community is stronger than ever thanks to a unique and persisted python subculture. 10 lessons over 10 years on building a great community.
talk.description: Plone is one of the oldest open source python communities still working today. Despite a decade of trials and tribulations, the community is stronger than ever thanks to a unique and persisted python subculture. 10 lessons over 10 years on building a great community.
talk.name: I Wish I Knew How to Quit You: Secrets to sustainable Python communities
talk.title: I Wish I Knew How to Quit You: Secrets to sustainable Python communities
